name.ja: <ruby>黎<rt>れい</rt></ruby><ruby>銘<rt>めい</rt></ruby><ruby>機<rt>き</rt></ruby>ヘオスヴァローグ

text.en:
2 LIGHT Machine monsters
If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can activate this effect; during the Standby Phase of the next turn, add 1 card from your GY to your hand with an effect that Fusion Summons. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or effect (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 face-up LIGHT Machine monster you control OR 2 LIGHT Machine monsters from your GY; negate the activation. You can only use each effect of "Eosvarog, Forger of the Dawn" once per turn.
